article_title: No flying under the radar here: Teens' futures take flight in Civil Air Patrol
article_text: Mary Beth Schweigert writes for the Lifestyle section of Lancaster Newspapers. She can be reached at mschweigert@lnpnews.com or (717) 291-8757. You can also follow@mbschweigert on Twitter.

og.description: Even the youngest members of local squadron can run emergency communications and help with disaster relief.
